title: Add About Me / Resume section
description: Create an about/resume section with bio, contact info, and professional background

title: Ingestion Pipeline: Phase 1 Improvements
description: First phase of ingestion pipeline enhancements focusing on extraction quality, duplicate detection, and batch processing. Target: 4 hours total effort, significant quality improvements.

title: Replace Unstructured with summarize.sh wrapper
description:
Replace ingestion/extractor.py with summarize.sh CLI wrapper for more robust content extraction.

**Why:** summarize.sh handles YouTube transcripts (multiple fallback methods), anti-scraping sites, and produces clean JSON output.

**How:** 
- Install: brew install steipete/tap/summarize
- Wrap CLI in Python subprocess call
- Parse JSON output into ExtractedContent dataclass

**Effort:** 30 min
**Impact:** Better extraction quality, YouTube support

title: Add duplicate detection via embeddings
description:
Before running DSPy classification, check if resource already exists or is semantically similar.

**Why:** Prevents duplicate entries, surfaces related resources for relationship mapping.

**How:**
- Add sentence-transformers dependency
- Embed new content (first 2000 chars)
- Compare against existing resource definitions
- Flag if similarity > 0.85

**Effort:** 2 hours
**Impact:** No more duplicates, automatic relationship suggestions

title: Add batch ingestion from markdown
description:
Add 'ingest.py batch <file.md>' command to process multiple URLs from markdown files.

**Why:** Process entire intake-queue.md in one run instead of 50 individual commands.

**How:**
- Parse markdown for URLs (regex extraction)
- Support formats: bare URL, URL with notes, URL with type hint
- Loop through cmd_add for each URL
- Summary report at end

**Effort:** 1 hour
**Impact:** 10x faster bulk ingestion

title: Add Resource Graph Visualizer
description: Implement interactive knowledge graph visualization similar to dbt-agent kg-visualization.html for browsing all resources

title: Apply Lip Gloss TUI styling to main site
description: Integrate the ASCII border styling from index-lipgloss-test.html into the main index.html

title: Add dbt-agent project section
description: Create a section showcasing the dbt-agent environment with updates on AI agents, memory systems, semantic layers, and conversational BI journey. Link to https://github.com/keithbinkly/dbt-agent
